name: Scotts Turf Builder Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix-3LB TB BLUEGRSS HEAT TOL
categoryPath: Patio & Garden/Gardening & Lawn Care/Fertilizer, Soil & Seeds

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix, 3 lbs
reviews.reviewText: Reseeded last fall 11. This year it was green and healthy all year even during the hottest months. Right now it's the best I have ever seen. It takes a couple weeks for all the seed to germinate so be patient. Great for the Northeast. Perfect mix, deep green and sweet smell.
reviews.title: Lawn best I have ever seen

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix, 3 lbs
reviews.reviewText:
Most of our lawns burn out where they make contact with the asphalt road because the dark road gets so hot in the summer. I cut out 6 inches of my lawn that was next to the road and spread Scotts Turf Builder Heat Tolerant Blue seeds. My lawn is perfect now. My one neighbor who was skeptical that this would work is amazed. His lawn has over 6 inches of dead grass.

When I overseed this fall, I am going to use the same Scotts seed.

Nick
Holly Springs, NC
reviews.title: Definitely has Heat Resistance!

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix, 3 lbs
reviews.reviewText: works well with peat moss give about 2-3 weeks to work.
reviews.title: grass seed

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix, 3 lbs
reviews.reviewText: Excellent coverage growth and with the water smart coating has stayed green even with the lack of rain we have had thiw spring
reviews.title: Great Product

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Heat-Tolerant Blue Mix, 3 lbs
reviews.reviewText: I choose this seed for our backyard which gets intense heat and little shade year round. Last year was my 1st time over seeding in 10 years, wanting the best product for the area this seed did not disappoint. This summer was brutal, but with much needed rain/watering the grass has quickly recovered. I just over seeded this fall and know the results will be outstanding. Forget buying cheap seed pay the extra and enjoy the great results.
reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
